Package controllers

Class NoteListController

java.lang.Object
controllers.NoteListController
public class NoteListController extends Object
A class to manage a list of notes and files to store the list of notes.

  • Constructor Details

    • NoteListController

      public NoteListController()
      Constructor of NoteListController.java without parameters. When an instance of the class is created, the list with notes and the variable with the file name counter are updated.

  • Method Details

    • getNotesListArray

      public Note[] getNotesListArray()
      Get current list of notes as array of notes.
      Returns:
      - array of notes

    • getNumberOfNotes

      public int getNumberOfNotes()
      Get number of notes.
      Returns:
      - number of notes as int variable

    • getFileNameNumber

      public int getFileNameNumber()
      Get current value of the counter of the number of file names.
      Returns:
      - number of file names

    • fileNameIteration

      public void fileNameIteration()
      Iterate the number of file names and write the value to fileCounter.TXT file. Updates the fileNameNumber value at the end of the method.

    • refreshNotesList

      public void refreshNotesList()
      Update the contents of the notes list from file ListOfNotes.TXTss
